a.title: Permanent Link to COVID-19/Coronavirus Information – Updated 4/16/2020
Permanent Link to COVID-19/Coronavirus Information – Updated 4/16/2020

div.p: Classes canceled through April 29, 2020. Read more here.

a.title: Permanent Link to SGF Spirit Store Open through April 22

img.alt: SGF Spirit Store Open through April 22
img.title: SGF Spirit Store Open through April 22

a.title: Permanent Link to SGF Spirit Store Open through April 22

p.a: SGF Spirit Store Open through April 22

div.p: The South Glens Falls CSD Spirit store is open for a week beginning today, April 15.

a.title: Permanent Link to Virtual board of education meeting on Monday, April 20
Permanent Link to Virtual board of education meeting on Monday, April 20

p.a: Virtual board of education meeting on Monday, April 20

div.p: The special Board of Education meeting on the school configuration options will take place at 6:30 p.m., tonight, on Monday, March 30, via remote video conference only with a livestream for the public.

a.title: Permanent Link to Guidelines for Home Learning Newsletter
Permanent Link to Guidelines for Home Learning Newsletter

div.p: The South Glens Falls CSD is excited to provide you with this Guidelines for Learning from Home newsletter as a resource. This is meant to serve as a guide for families as we all navigate our schools being closed and students learning at home. Click here to view the newsletter.

a.title: Permanent Link to Junior Lauren Willis named one of 10 Capital District Sports Women of the Year

img.alt: Junior Lauren Willis named one of 10 Capital District Sports Women of the Year
img.title: Junior Lauren Willis named one of 10 Capital District Sports Women of the Year

a.title: Permanent Link to Junior Lauren Willis named one of 10 Capital District Sports Women of the Year

p.a: Junior Lauren Willis named one of 10 Capital District Sports Women of the Year

div.p: South Glens Falls High School junior Lauren Willis, who competes in field hockey, lacrosse and bowling, has been named as one of the 10 scholastic award recipients for 2020 by the Capital District Sports Women of the Year.

a.title: Permanent Link to Reminder! Register your child for kindergarten next year!

img.alt: Reminder! Register your child for kindergarten next year!
img.title: Reminder! Register your child for kindergarten next year!

a.title: Permanent Link to Reminder! Register your child for kindergarten next year!

p.a: Reminder! Register your child for kindergarten next year!

div.p: Students who will enter kindergarten in the South Glens Falls Central School District in September 2020 can now begin the pre-registration process. Children born on or before Dec. 1, 2015, are eligible for enrollment in kindergarten in September 2020.

a.title: Permanent Link to Home Learning Support for Families
Permanent Link to Home Learning Support for Families

div.p: Teachers and the curriculum team in the South Glens Falls CSD have been working to create learning materials and resources that students can use to practice skills, review what they’ve learned and explore new topics while school is closed. Read more here.

a.title: Permanent Link to Meal Opportunities During School Cancellation/Closure
Permanent Link to Meal Opportunities During School Cancellation/Closure

div.p: Find out how to get meals during COVID-19/Coronavirus Cancellations/Closures
